# 6.0 Docs

> Documentation for 6.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 1*

- [.NET 6 breaking change: Default console logger formatting in container images](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/containers/6.0/console-formatter-default.md): Learn about the .NET 6 breaking change in .NET containers where the default formatting for the console logger in aspnet container images is no longer JSON.
